CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1962, pg.1 reads: "Good Samaritan - Leon Lioon, a Bedford Ave. grocer, smiles approvingly as two young customers, Philip Cyrus (left) and George Watson (right), deposit change in a Mason jar earmarked for "Buggsy" Drafts. Without any outside persuasion Mr. Lioon made his own posters and started a personal campaign for the boy after reading of his plight in Courier. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Grocer Leon Lioon and customers Philip Cyrus and George Watson, posed around collection jar and written sign inscribed "Let's All Help Buggsy", in grocery store, Bedford Avenue
